summary: FBI 302 report documenting an interview conducted on August 16, 2019, at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York. The interview was with an inmate regarding his observations of Jeffrey Epstein's routine and his own movements prior to Epstein's death. The inmate provided no information regarding Epstein's death.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The deceased inmate at MCC whose routine is described by another inmate. He was housed in cell 220 in L Tier and would be in legal from approximately 9am to 9pm.

persons.name: Fernandez
persons.context: An inmate housed in the Special Housing Unit at MCC who was interviewed by FBI agents. He described his own movements and his observations of Jeffrey Epstein's routine in the days prior to Epstein's death.

connections.description: Both were inmates at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) at the same time. Fernandez observed Epstein's routine in the facility.

events.title: Inmate Fernandez's visit and cell transfer
events.description: Inmate Fernandez received a visit from his girlfriend at MCC. He was suspected of receiving contraband during the visit and was placed in a 'dry room' for approximately 25 hours before being moved to I tier Cell III.

events.title: FBI interview of inmate Fernandez
events.description: FBI Special Agents and an OIG Investigator interviewed inmate Fernandez at the Metropolitan Correctional Center regarding his observations and any information about Jeffrey Epstein's death.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC), 150 Park Row, New York, NY
New York, New York, United States
keyFacts: The interview was conducted on August 16, 2019, shortly after Jeffrey Epstein's death on August 10, 2019.
Inmate Fernandez was housed in the Special Housing Unit and had been moved to a 'dry room' for contraband suspicion after a visit from his girlfriend on August 9, 2019.
Fernandez stated that Jeffrey Epstein's routine was to be 'in legal' from approximately 9am to 9pm daily and that Epstein was housed in cell 220 in L Tier.
Fernandez explicitly stated he had no information regarding the death of Jeffrey Epstein.
The document is a standard FBI 302 interview report, containing neither recommendations nor conclusions of the FBI.
